'''Dr. Berman''' is a doctor who worked on [[Toby Chang]].

==History==
Dr. Berman came in to sedate Toby so he could get a central line for his stem cell transplant. However, he thrashed around and refused to let her put him under, afraid he wouldn't wake up. Cooper was able to calm him down enough to let Dr. Berman sedate him.

==Career==
She is a doctor at [[St. Ambrose Hospital]].
